price: 8. Hay gentes (hipócritas) que dicen: «Creemos en Al-lah y en el Día de la Resurrección», pero, en verdad, no son creyentes.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yaqūlu āmannā bil-lahi wabil-yawmi al-ākhiri wamā hum bimu'minīna
